title: Belle Lawrence - Almighty Mixes
description:
Belle Lawrence

Real Name:	Belle Erskine

Profile:	Singer/songwriter Belle Erskine started her career as a dancer/singer in the West End Musical ?CATS?.
On leaving the show, she began auditioning for bands and producers and quickly became very much in demand as a vocalist and writer.
Her versatile voice, sometimes sweet, sometimes extremely powerful can easily flit between soft whispering vocals and big diva belts!!!
Belle is well known for her absolute professionalism, she is a quick and accurate vocalist, which puts her much in demand in the U.K, Europe and L.A.
She has worked and continues to work with bands, musicians, DJ?s and producers of the highest calibre.
Belle writes and records for many labels including Hed Kandi, BMG Italy, Northstar, Almighty records, Sound4group Italy and Fierce angel records, aswell as many other labels.
Most recently Belle has been writing and recording with world renowned producers and DJ?s Daniele Tignino and Eric Kupper. 

This is my collection of the Almighty Records hits that Belle sings.  A MUST for High Energy dance lovers and anyone familiar with Almighty Records.
